summary: The mod dissapeared (weird) & I loved it so I'm backing it up!
descriptionHtml:
This adds one minion per mastery perk, provides a book that allows you to resurrect the dead, allows minions to level up with you, gives powers to edit your minion's equipment or kill them outright, teleports them to your location when getting too far away, drastically increases the duration & raises the level cap on each resurrection spell.

Sadly this is not mine & I'd give credit if I knew the author's name but I do not. If anyone is to let me know &/or find out why the mod dissapeared I will give credit. Thanks.
author: MEEEEEEEEEE
